name: Becko US Jewelry Organizer Roll Travel Jewel Bag case for Multiple Necklaces, Rings, Bracelets, Supple Leather & Suede, Large Capacity Without Crease, Lightweight, Portable & Practical (Blue)
short_description: Premium Material - Constructed by soft leather and quality suede, Becko US jewelry roll takes on a graceful look and allows you to organize your jewelry neatly. A good helping hand to protect your valuable belongings while on the go.

Anti-winding Design - Designed with up to 7 snapped bands and 7 corresponding elastic bands to effectively prevent necklaces from intertwining with each other. Four elasticated pouches at the bottom provide further protection for the beloved pendants and gems.
Large Capacity - Capacious enough to store up to 7 necklaces, 16 pairs of ear studs or earrings, at least 8 rings, and bigger jewels like bracelets, wristwatches, bangles, or sunglasses.
Innovative Design - A detachable zipped suede pouch can be used independently, while two side flips offer extra protection for the necklaces and prevent them from falling out during transport.
Compact Size - With a folded size of 8.1 × 5.9 in (20.5 × 15cm), it is really lightweight and convenient for trips, travel and parties.

name: Travel Jewelry Organizer - Imitation Leather Travel Jewelry Case with Adjustable Pages, Jewelry Bag for Earrings,Rings,Necklaces,Bracelets-Perfect,Waterproof, Ideal for Trips & Gifts (Black)
short_description: 【Travel-Ready Portable Organizer】This travel jewelry organizer is your perfect trip companion. At 9.8×7.1×3.1 inches, it’s compact yet roomy enough for travel or daily use—easily fits in suitcases, tote bags, or backpacks, ideal for weekend getaways or business trips. The upgraded secure zipper keeps your jewelry in place, preventing loss. A must-have for travelers needing organized, protected jewelry on the go.

【Tangle-Free Classified Storage】Say goodbye to tangled necklaces and lost earrings! Features 4 necklace pockets, 6 anti-tangle clips, 14 earring slots, 2 ring holders, 10 small clear pouches (3.5×2.7 inches) for tiny items, and 6 large pouches (4.9×3.5 inches) for hoops or bracelets. Each compartment is designed to keep jewelry organized and accessible—find what you need in seconds.

【Waterproof Protection for Precious Jewelry】Made of high-quality faux leather, this case is stylish and waterproof, shielding jewelry from spills and moisture. Inside, 5 soft transparent pages with individual zippers add extra security—preventing drops, loss, or scratches. With 10 small pouches (for rings/studs) and 6 large pouches (for necklaces/bracelets), it offers full protection for all your pieces.

【Adjustable Loose-Leaf Design】Customize your storage with the adjustable loose-leaf binder! 5 removable transparent pages let you add/remove pages to fit your travel needs—organize by size, style, or quantity. Arrange jewelry for practicality and visibility, making your entire collection easy to see and access.

【Perfect Gift for Jewelry-Loving Women】Designed for women, this transparent-pouch organizer is a standout gift for birthdays, Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, anniversaries, or Christmas. Blending functionality, style, and protection, it’s a thoughtful, practical present any jewelry lover will cherish.
